articles.title: President Trump Threatens Homeless People to Immediately Move Out of Washington
articles.description: President Trump calls on homeless individuals to "move out" of Washington, D.C., as the administration plans to deploy National Guard troops to the capital.

articles.title: Trump Administration Wants to Settle with UCLA for $1 Billion
articles.description: The Trump administration seeks a $1 billion settlement with UCLA over alleged campus antisemitism, following similar settlements with other universities.
